author: Fextralife
description:
Nightreign The Deep of Night UPDATE - Changes & Impressions
In this Fextralife video, I'm going to be talking a little bit about the Deep of Night, which is a new game mode for Elden Ring Nightreign that just launched a few hours ago. I've been playing it all day. I want to talk about the patch notes, what has changed with the game, what the new game mode is, some tips for it, and just kind of just get into my general impressions of how it plays so far.

Elden Ring Nightreign Wiki: https://eldenringnightreign.wiki.fextralife.com/Elden+Ring+Nightreign+Wiki

Timestamp:
0:00 Nightreign Deep of Night and Patch 1.02.2
0:20 Deep of Night explained
7:39 Patch Notes 1.02.2
7:47 Nightfarer Adjustments
11:24 Weapons, Passives, and Special Effects
12:15 Relic Adjustments
14:37 Everdark Sovereign Bosses Adjustments
17:42 Other Adjustments
18:41 Bug Fixes
